means: （使某物）起皱褶，起皱纹，起波纹

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin corrugat- 'wrinkled', from the verb corrugare, from cor- (expressing intensive force) + rugare (from ruga 'a wrinkle')

means.word_mean: (使某物)起皱褶,起皱纹,起波纹

sentences.en: The wind corrugates the surface of the sea.
His brow corrugated with the effort of thinking.
sentences.cn: 他皱着眉头用心地思考。
